content: tulips hat & scarf by jjuulliiee rsocmhraanmome thridge materials cascade 220 worsted weight wool 2 or any worsted weight yarn to obtain gauge crochet hook size i or size to obtain gauge for hat split ring marker for hat scarf chain 24 row 1 single_crochet in second chain from hook and each chain across chain 1 and turn 23 stitches row 2 single_crochet in each st across chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet in next row and turn row 3 skip 1 single_crochet 2 double_crochet in next single_crochet v_stitch formed *skip 2 single_crochet 2 double_crochet in next single_crochet* to within 2 single_crochet of end double_crochet in last single_crochet chain 3 and turn 7 v-stitches row 4 3 double_crochet in middle between stitches of ea v_stitch across 1 double_crochet in top of ch3 at end of row chain 1 turn 7 groups of 3dc repeat row 2-4 until scarf is length desired single_crochet 2 row and bind off block scarf to bring out design hat chain 78 join with slip_stitch to form circle being careful not to twist row 1 chain 1 single_crochet in ea chain around join with slip_stitch row 2 chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in first single_crochet v_stitch formed *skip 2 single_crochet 2 double_crochet in next single_crochet* repeat from * around join with slip_stitch in center of first v between stitches row 3 chain 3 2 double_crochet in middle of v-st 3 double_crochet in middle of ea v_stitch around join with slip_stitch in top of beginning chain 3 row 4 chain 1 single_crochet in first st and each st around join with slip_stitch 78 st row 5-8 repeat row 2 thru 4 one time next row chain 1 single_crochet in first single_crochet place marker in stitch just made single_crochet around to marker continue single_crochet around replacing marker each time you come to it until piece measures 5 ½ inches do not start these rounds with chain 1 crown shaping row 1 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 11 around row 2 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 10 around row 3 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 9 around row 4 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 8 around row 5 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 7 around row 6 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 6 around row 7 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 5 around row 8 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 4 around row 9 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 3 around row 10 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 2 around row 11 sc2 decrease single_crochet 1 around row 12 sc2 decrease around join with slip_stitch and bind off leaving a 6 tail thread tail in tapestry needle and thread through the final round of stitches and pull tight weave in ends © 2006 jjujuulliliieee seettchhhrridridaggmeem
